sentence.Network_en: Like all dreams it had its own weird illogicality.
sentence.Network_cn: 象所有的梦一样,这场梦亦离奇古怪,毫无逻辑.

sentence.Network_en: Unconsciousness has the characteristics of spontaneity, ambiguity, illogicality and stability.
sentence.Network_cn: 无意识具有自发性 、 隐蔽性 、 非逻辑性和稳定性特点.
